segments.text: I was wondering how you are going to calculate our final grades .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Grades are based on many things
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually I look at all of it and let's not forget class participation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you grade on a curve or use percentages ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Homework , attendance , and quizzes are sixty percent ; the mid-term and final are worth twenty percent each .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will allow one unexcused absence ; after that you need to contact me ahead of time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you tell us if we are failing during the year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You will be able to track your progress during the year .
segments.speaker: S2
